languages.text: "Взгляни в глаза правде — ты не поборник справедливости, а манипулятор, идущий по трупам. Я не осуждаю тебя, наоборот, мне бы пригодился человек таких талантов. Вместе мы могли бы достичь многого..."

traits.locale_text: "Адальберт, взгляни в глаза правде — ты не поборник справедливости, а искусный манипулятор и лжец, что ради цели идет по трупам. Я не осуждаю тебя, наоборот, мне бы пригодился человек таких талантов. Вместе мы могли бы достичь многого..."

languages.text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."
languages.original_text: "Взгляни в глаза правде — ты не поборник справедливости, а манипулятор, идущий по трупам. Я не осуждаю тебя, наоборот, мне бы пригодился человек таких талантов. Вместе мы могли бы достичь многого..."

"Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."

languages.text: «Acepte la realidad: no es el campeón de la justicia. Es un manipulador que asciende a base de pisar los cadáveres de los demás. No le estoy juzgando, que conste. Al contrario, me vendrían bien sus cualidades. Juntos lograríamos grandes cosas...».
languages.original_text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."

traits.locale_text: «Acepte la realidad: no es el campeón de la justicia. Es un manipulador que asciende a base de pisar los cadáveres de los demás. No le estoy juzgando, que conste. Al contrario, me vendrían bien sus cualidades. Juntos lograríamos grandes cosas...».

languages.text: 「現実を直視しろ。お前は正義の味方ではない。他人の屍の上に立ち、自らを高める操り屋だ。私はお前をを批判しているのではなく、才能を利用できるか考えているのだ。なんせ私たちは共に大きなことを成し遂げられるはずだから…」
languages.original_text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."

traits.locale_text: 「現実を直視しろ。お前は正義の味方ではない。他人の屍の上に立ち、自らを高める操り屋だ。私はお前をを批判しているのではなく、才能を利用できるか考えているのだ。なんせ私たちは共に大きなことを成し遂げられるはずだから…」

languages.text: “面对事实吧，你根本不是什么正义的捍卫者。你不过是个煽动者，踩着别人的尸体，爬到了现在的地位。我并不是在评判你，恰恰相反，我正需要像你这么有才能的人。我们可以一起做很多事情……”
languages.original_text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."

traits.locale_text: “面对事实吧，你根本不是什么正义的捍卫者。你不过是个煽动者，踩着别人的尸体，爬到了现在的地位。我并不是在评判你，恰恰相反，我正需要像你这么有才能的人。我们可以一起做很多事情……”

languages.text: "Seht den Fakten ins Auge ... Ihr seid kein Streiter der Gerechtigkeit. Ihr seid ein Manipulator, der sich selbst erhebt, indem er auf den Leichen anderer Leute steht. Ich verurteile Euch nicht. Ganz im Gegenteil, ich könnte ein Mann mit solchen Talenten gebrauchen. Gemeinsam könnten wir viel erreichen ..."
languages.original_text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."

traits.locale_text: "Seht den Fakten ins Auge ... Ihr seid kein Streiter der Gerechtigkeit. Ihr seid ein Manipulator, der sich selbst erhebt, indem er auf den Leichen anderer Leute steht. Ich verurteile Euch nicht. Ganz im Gegenteil, ich könnte ein Mann mit solchen Talenten gebrauchen. Gemeinsam könnten wir viel erreichen ..."

languages.text: « Rendez-vous à l'évidence : vous n'êtes en rien un champion de la justice. Vous n'êtes qu'un manipulateur qui s'élève en piétinant les cadavres d'autrui. Je ne vous juge pas. Au contraire, j'aurais bien besoin d'un homme de votre talent. Ensemble, nous pourrions accomplir des miracles… »
languages.original_text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."

traits.locale_text: « Rendez-vous à l'évidence : vous n'êtes en rien un champion de la justice. Vous n'êtes qu'un manipulateur qui s'élève en piétinant les cadavres d'autrui. Je ne vous juge pas. Au contraire, j'aurais bien besoin d'un homme de votre talent. Ensemble, nous pourrions accomplir des miracles… »

languages.text: "Gerçekler net: Sen adaletin bir müdafisi değilsin. Sen başkalarının cesetlerinin üzerinde yükselmiş bir manipülasyon ustasısın. Seni yargılamıyorum. Tam aksine, böylesine yeteneklere sahip bir adam çok işime yarar. Birlikte büyük işler başarabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Face the facts — you are no champion of justice. You are a manipulator who raises himself up by standing on the corpses of others. I am not judging you. On the contrary, I could use a man of such talents. Together we could accomplish a great deal..."
